scripts.dev: for /f %i in ('git rev-parse HEAD') do set REACT_APP_VERSION=%i && vite
scripts.dev-all: for /f %i in ('git rev-parse HEAD') do set REACT_APP_VERSION=%i && tauri dev
scripts.build: for /f %i in ('git rev-parse HEAD') do set REACT_APP_VERSION=%i && tsc && vite build
scripts.preview: for /f %i in ('git rev-parse HEAD') do set REACT_APP_VERSION=%i && vite preview
scripts.tauri: for /f %i in ('git rev-parse HEAD') do set REACT_APP_VERSION=%i && tauri
scripts.build-all: for /f %i in ('git rev-parse HEAD') do set REACT_APP_VERSION=%i && tauri build
scripts.dev-all:mac: export REACT_APP_VERSION=$(git rev-parse HEAD) && tauri dev
scripts.build:mac: export REACT_APP_VERSION=$(git rev-parse HEAD) && tsc && vite build
scripts.preview:mac: export REACT_APP_VERSION=$(git rev-parse HEAD) && vite preview
scripts.build-all:mac: export REACT_APP_VERSION=$(git rev-parse HEAD) && tauri build
